workflow.name: Classify and auto-reply to Gmail with OpenAI, Google Sheets RAG and Telegram
workflow.description:
# üì® Gmail Classifier ‚ÄîClassify emails using AI and automate responses

This workflow delivers a complete, enterprise-grade Gmail automation system designed for high-volume teams. It classifies incoming emails, applies labels, generates AI-powered responses, and routes messages to the right department. It also includes optional demo email generation and an inbox cleanup utility so teams can test the workflow instantly.

## üöÄ What This Workflow Does
- Classifies Gmail messages into **High Priority**, **Customer Support**, **Promotions**, or **Finance/Billing**
- Generates AI-written replies or drafts based on category
- Applies Gmail labels automatically
- Uses RAG from Google Sheets for Support queries
- Sends real-time internal notifications (Telegram)
- Includes tools to generate & delete test emails for repeatable QA

## üè¢ Who This Is For
Teams that want **reliable, automated inbox management**:
- Customer Support  
- Sales  
- Billing & Finance  
- Operations  
- Solo founders who need executive inbox automation  
- AI-powered enterprise workflows using Gmail

## üß© Internal Workflow Overview
1. **Gmail Trigger** pulls unread emails from the inbox  
2. **Email Classifier Agent** (OpenAI) cleans + classifies the email  
3. **Switch Node** routes to the correct workflow lane  
4. Labels are added ‚Üí AI responders generate the message ‚Üí internal teams get notified  
5. Optional: Demo email generator + inbox cleanup for testing

## üõ†Ô∏è How to Set Up
1. Add credentials:  
   - Gmail OAuth2  
   - OpenAI / Gemini  
   - Google Sheets OAuth2  
2. Copy the demo sheet:  
   **https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A959skQt0a7RbdsD0IGaCbPxMv4a-HjmQL4hwB9TcXc/edit?usp=sharing**  
3. Update the Google Sheets nodes with your Document ID + Sheet Name  
4. Enable **Gmail Trigger** (UNREAD filter recommended)  
5. Use ‚ÄúSend Demo Emails‚Äù ‚Üí test end-to-end behavior  
6. Run the Gmail Classifier workflow live

## üì¶ Requirements
- Gmail API access  
- OpenAI/Gemini API key  
- Google Sheets OAuth (for RAG/lookup)  
- n8n (latest recommended version)

## üéØ Ideal Enterprise Use Cases
- Automated customer support with AI-written replies  
- High-priority routing for executives  
- Finance & billing summarization for operations  
- Filtering promotions/marketing noise from shared inboxes  
- AI-augmented helpdesk workflows

## üß™ Test Data Included
Use the Demo Sheet tabs:
- **Sample_Emails** ‚Üí pre-written emails for every category  
- **Demo_Emails** ‚Üí rows sent as live test emails  

Copy ‚Üí paste ‚Üí run.

## üîñ Tags
Gmail, AI, Inbox Automation, Support Automation, Enterprise, Email Classification, OpenAI, RAG, Google Sheets

---

**Template Author:** Sandeep Patharkar  
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sandeeppatharkar  
Skool: https://www.skool.com/aic-plus

values.content:
=You are an executive assistant. Your job is to respond to incoming high priority inquiries as accurately as you can.

Here is the email you are responding to:  {{ $('Gmail Trigger1').item.json.text }}

Please output the following parameters: 
Subject: Subject
Message: actual message
Email_Draft: This is the response to the email.
Text_Message: This is to notify the respective team over slack / telegram / teams

=You are a customer service representative. Your job is to respond to incoming customer support inquiries as accurately as you can, and if it is an inquiry you cannot handle, please refer the user to the following email: yourname@xyz.com
Here is the email you are responding to:  {{ $('Gmail Trigger1').item.json.text }}

parameters.text: customer support query was auto replied
Promotional email removed from the Inbox
There is a billing enquiry that needs your immediate attention

parameters.content:
## Demo Email Generator
Sends sample emails to test classification logic.

values.content:
=You are an intelligent Email Classifier Agent.

Classify the provided email into one of these categories:

- High_Priority: Emails requiring immediate attention or action from key stakeholders, clients, or decision-makers. Typically time-sensitive with requests, deadlines, or escalated issues. Keywords: urgent, ASAP, immediate, deadline, action required, high priority.

- Customer_Support: Emails related to ongoing communication with current clients or New customers seeking information about our Services, including service requests, feedback, support tickets, and inquiries. Keywords: request for information, Inquiry, support, question, follow-up, feedback. You have access to Google Sheet tool "FTAI_Info". Use this tool to get information about our Courses and Company.

- Promotions: Emails about marketing campaigns, promotional offers, newsletters, or business updates from partners. Keywords: newsletter, promotion, offer, sale, campaign, marketing, launch.

- Finance/Billing: Emails dealing with financial matters such as invoices, billing statements, payment reminders, or expense reports. Keywords: invoice, payment, billing, receipt, financial, expense, account.

Do not explain your reasoning. Only output a JSON object with the exact fields and classification.

=you need to clean up the html tags and any other data coming in the email

just output clean data in JSON format as follows

{
  "id": "abc123",
  "createdDateTime": "2025-09-09T12:00:00Z",
  "lastModifiedDateTime": "2025-09-09T12:00:00Z",
  "receivedDateTime": "2025-09-09T11:59:00Z",
  "hasAttachments": false,
  "subject": "subject",
  "isRead": false,
  "body": "Entire body cleaned up",
  "sender": "billing@vendor.com",
  "from": "billing@vendor.com",
  "toRecipients": "me@company.com",
  "classification": "Finance/Billing"
}

## Demo Cleanup
Deletes test emails to reset the inbox.

Here is the incoming message:  {{ $('Gmail Trigger1').item.json.text }}

Summary
Recommendation
Text_Message: This is to notify the respective team over slack / telegram

=You are a finance/billing assistant. Your job is to summarize incoming emails relating to finance and billing and summarize them in a short and concise way.

Here is the incoming email:  {{ $('Gmail Trigger1').item.json.text }}

Please output the following parameters:
Subject
Message
Text_Message: This is to notify the respective team over slack / telegram

parameters.content:
# üì® Gmail Classifier ‚ÄîClassify emails using AI and automate responses

## How it works
This workflow monitors incoming Gmail messages and uses an AI classifier to categorize each email into High Priority, Customer Support, Promotions, or Finance/Billing.  
A central switch routes emails to the correct handling logic, where AI responders generate drafts, summaries, or auto-replies. Optional Telegram alerts notify internal teams in real time.  
Demo utilities are included to simulate emails and reset the inbox during testing.

## Setup steps
1. Add credentials for Gmail and OpenAI (Telegram optional).
2. (Optional) Enable **Send Demo Emails** to populate your inbox with test messages.
3. (Optional) Run **Delete Demo Emails** to reset the inbox.
4. Enable the Gmail Trigger (UNREAD filter recommended).
5. Review and customize responder prompts for tone, escalation, and SOPs.
6. Activate the workflow to start live classification.

**Author:** Sandeep Patharkar  
**Community:** https://www.skool.com/aic-plus  
**Website:** https://www.fasttrackaimastery.com

## üì§ Send Demo Emails (Testing and Simulating bulk email)

### üìù What This Does  
Quickly sends a batch of demo emails to your Gmail inbox so you can test every category without manually sending anything.

### üéØ Why Use It  
Testing email automation usually requires writing dozens of emails.  
This tool generates realistic test messages instantly.

## üóëÔ∏è Delete Demo Emails (‚ö†Ô∏è Wipes Inbox ‚Äî Use Carefully)

### üìù What This Does  
Deletes all demo/test emails from your Gmail inbox so you can start fresh for the next testing cycle.

Be VERY CAREFUL WITH THE REAL GMAIL ACCOUNT.

## High Priority Emails
A Draft will be created for Human in the Loop

## Human in the Loop Review
**Before sending out

## Customer Support Auto-Responder
AI generates replies using internal Q&A and SOP data.
## Demo Email setup and Cleanup ( Activate if Needed)

user.name: Sandeep Patharkar | www.FastTrackAiMastery.com
user.bio: AI and automation enthusiast with a strong background in building intelligent workflows. As an AWS Certified Solutions Architect, I design secure, scalable, cost-effective cloud solutions. Passionate about integrating AI to streamline processes and solve real-world challenges. Always eager to collaborate, share knowledge, and empower the community to push the boundaries of cloud and AI.
